document_data.name: Jormund Kannath
document_data.mainbody: rmund had blonde hair and a large forked and braided beard.
document_data.Description: Jormund had blonde hair and a large forked and braided beard.
document_data.History: When [[Arman Argentine]] arrived in Eveningstar to take recruits for the [[Tethyamar mining outpost]], Jormund took note but wasn't particularly interested for himself.
